topic.title: What we need is someone to make a site for Bit Torrent (movies / music / apps / games)
topic.body: I hope this catches on so we can get out of the firing line of the MPAA.

1_19GDcmuGz3D2epgu9k65yMY9WMYDG8eZCP.body:
> [cannonfodder](#comment_26_1GCMDNMgJHvZJfdbD9ygDmpBdnVAobdJYg): There's tvepisodes for TV torrents. Episodes are also inserted into Freenet.

Thanks.

> [methodx](#comment_6_1CFhytwoGGPNqmueehPqotaf2iG9uxD98e): ZeroTorrent is just a clone of ZeroTalk. I'm sure we all appreciate the efforts of the curator, but it's not a native torrenting site. ZeroNet needs a Kickass Torrents clone or at least something with a decent UI. PLAY is a good start.

Absolutely! I that is what I am talking about.

> [tkarita](#comment_14_1GervYZoP82e8X1Rgc4wyMkJY2zSsJuq8t): Have you seen ZeroTorrent?

Yes, Thanks.
